snippet: A West Texas county attorney has been found guilty of retaliating against two whistle-blowing nurses who anonymously reported a doctor to state medical regulators.
lead_paragraph: A West Texas county attorney has been found guilty of retaliating against two whistle-blowing nurses who anonymously reported a doctor to state medical regulators.

headline.main: Texas: County Attorney Found Guilty in Retaliation Case
headline.print_headline: Texas: County Attorney Found Guilty in Retaliation Case
headline.seo: In Texas, County Attorney Found Guilty in Retaliation Case
